items: Are 'tsd' or 'dtslint' used to test type definitions?
Are 'expectType' assertions used to verify inference?
Are mock types created using 'Partial<T>' or 'DeepPartial<T>'?
Are test files excluded from the production build?
Is 'ts-jest' or similar used for running tests with TS support?
Are private members accessed safely in tests (e.g., casting to any/unknown)?
